100000	A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.\n\nA transcription of "Moon," as spoken by the Great Ones\ninhabiting the nightmare. Gain more Blood Echoes.\n\nThe Great Ones that inhabit the nightmare are \nsympathetic in spirit, and often answer when called upon.
100001	A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth. \n\nA transcription of "Eye," as spoken by left-behind Great\nOnes. Allows one to make additional discoveries.\n\nEyes symbolize the truth Master Willem sought in his\nresearch. Disillusioned by the limits of human intellect,\nMaster Willem looked to beings from higher planes\nfor guidance, and sought to line his brain with eyes\nin order to elevate his thoughts.
100002	A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.\n\nThe twisted cross means "metamorphosis."\n\nRotated clockwise, this rune boosts HP.\n\nThe discovery of blood made their dream of evolution a\nreality. Metamorphosis, and the excesses and deviation\nthat followed, were only the beginning.
100003	A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.\n\nThe twisted cross means "metamorphosis."\n\nRotated anti-clockwise, this rune boosts stamina.\n\nThe discovery of blood made their dream of evolution a \nreality. Metamorphosis, and the excesses and deviation\nthat followed, was only the beginning.
100004	A Caryll rune that transcribes inhuman sounds.\nThe "Clawmark" is an impulse to seek the warmth of blood like a beast. It strengthens visceral attacks, one of the darker hunter techniques.\n\nAlthough the difference is subtle, Runesmith Caryll describes the "Beast" as a horrific and unwelcome instinct deep within the hearts of men, while "Clawmark" is an alluring invitation to accept this very nature.
100005	A Caryll rune that transcribes inhuman sounds.\n"Blood Rapture" is the raw euphoria of the warmth of blood.\nRestores HP with visceral attacks, one of the darker hunter techniques.\n\nThis rune resonates with servants of the Queen, carrier of the Child of Blood, who yearn for their\nQueen's blood with little hope of requitement.\nFor them, they find solace in "Blood Rapture," that serves as a surrogate for their desires.
100006	A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth. \n\nThe "Liaison" sees kinship in the warmth of blood, \nacknowledging this as a wondrous hunter technique.\n\nVisceral attacks restore Quicksilver Bullets.\n\nHuman or no, the blood that flows from the crevice is a\nmedium of the highest grade, and clearly "Liaison" has a\nritualistic significance.
100007	A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.\n\nThe "Heir" sees sentimentality in the warmth of blood,\nacknowledging this as one of the darker hunter \ntechniques.\n\nMore Blood Echoes gained from visceral attacks.\n\nPerhaps the "Heir" is a hunter who bears the\nechoing will of those before him.
100008	A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.\n\nThis transcription of the Great Ones' inhuman voices \nripples like a watery reflection. This rune means "Lake,"\nand those branded by it enjoy augmented defense.\n\nGreat volumes of water serve as a bulwark guarding sleep,\nand an augur of the eldritch Truth.\n\nOvercome this hindrance, and seek what is yours.

100021	A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth. \n\nA transcription of the roar of a labyrinth beast, the bearer\nof the "Beast" rune has accentuated transformation effects. \n\n"Beast" is one of the early Caryll Runes, as well as\none of the first to be deemed forbidden. The discovery \nof blood entailed the discovery of undesirable beasts.

100025	A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.\n\nSeveral runes relate to "Blood," including "Communion,"\nwhich raises the maximum number of blood vials one \nmay carry. \n\nThis rune represents the Healing Church and its ministers.\nBlood ministration is, of course, the pursuit of \ncommunion.
100026	A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth. \n\nThe Great One Oedon, lacking form, exists only in voice, and is symbolized by this rune. Those branded by it enjoy a larger supply of Quicksilver Bullets.\n\nHuman or no, the oozing blood is a medium of the highest grade, and the essence of the formless Great One, Oedon.\nBoth Oedon, and Oedon's inadvertent worshippers, surreptitiously seek the precious blood.
1000000	A blood gem that fortifies weapons and adds various\nproperties. Blood gems are especially rare blood stones \nthat grow on coldblood.\n\nBlood gems are kneaded into weapons using workshop \ntools, but only when of matching shape. Most radial \nblood gems have effects that bear upon physical attacks.

Most radial \nblood gems have effects that bear upon physical attacks.

Blood gems are especially rare blood stones \nthat grow on coldblood.\n\nBlood gems are kneaded into weapons using workshop \ntools, but only when of matching shape. Most radial \nblood gems have effects that bear upon physical attacks.

3101900	A blood gem that fortifies weapons and adds various properties. The sickly spots are indicative of a curse, but this gem's malicious effects are perfect for bolstering certain types of weapons.\n\nMost waning blood gems provide rare special effects such as fire, bolt, or healing.

4000000	A blood gem that fortifies weapons and adds various properties. Blood gems are especially rare blood stones that grow on coldblood.\n\nBlood gems are kneaded into weapons using workshop tools, but only when of matching shape.\n\nCircular blood gems are normally used to fortify firearms.

11000000	A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.\n\nA transcription of "moon," as spoken by the Great Ones\ninhabiting the nightmare. \n\nGain more Blood Echoes.\n\nThe Great Ones that inhabit the nightmare are \nsympathetic in spirit, and often answer when called upon.
11000001	A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth. \n\nA transcription of "Eye," as spoken by left-behind Great Ones. Allows one to make additional discoveries.\n\nEyes symbolise the truth Master Willem sought in his research. Disillusioned by the limits of human intellect, Master Willem looked to beings from higher planes for guidance, and sought to line his brain with eyes in order to elevate his thoughts.
11000002	A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.\n\nThe twisted cross means "metamorphosis."\n\nRotated clockwise, this rune boosts HP.\n\nThe discovery of blood made their dream of evolution\na reality. Metamorphosis, and the excesses and deviation\nthat followed, were only the beginning.
11000003	A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.\n\nThe twisted cross means "metamorphosis."\n\nRotated anti-clockwise, this rune boosts stamina.\n\nThe discovery of blood made their dream of evolution\na reality. Metamorphosis, and the excesses and deviation\nthat followed, was only the beginning.
11000004	A Caryll rune that transcribes inhuman sounds.\nThe "Clawmark" is an impulse to seek the warmth of blood like a beast. It strengthens visceral attacks, one of the darker hunter techniques.\n\nAlthough the difference is subtle, Runesmith Caryll describes the "Beast" as a horrific and unwelcome instinct deep within the hearts of men, while "Clawmark" is an alluring invitation to accept this very nature.
11000005	A Caryll rune that transcribes inhuman sounds.\n"Blood Rapture" is the raw euphoria of the warmth of blood.\nRestores HP with visceral attacks, one of the darker hunter techniques.\n\nThis rune resonates with servants of the Queen, carrier of the Child of Blood, who yearn for their Queen's blood with little hope of requitement.\nFor them, they find solace in "Blood Rapture," that serves as a surrogate for their desires.
11000006	A Caryll rune that transcribes inhuman sounds.\n\n"Writhe" sees a subtle mucous in the warmth of blood, and acknowledges visceral attacks as one of the darker hunter techniques. Visceral attacks restore Quicksilver Bullets.\n\nHuman or no, the oozing blood is a medium of the highest grade, and the essence of the formless Great One, Oedon.\nBoth Oedon, and Oedon's inadvertent worshippers, surreptitiously seek the precious blood.
11000007	A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.\n\nThe "Heir" sees sentimentality in the warmth of blood,\nacknowledging this as one of the darker hunter \ntechniques.\n\nMore Blood Echoes gained from visceral attacks.\n\nPerhaps the "Heir" is a hunter who bears the echoing \nwill of those before him.
11000008	A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.\n\nThis transcription of the Great Ones' inhuman voices \nripples like a watery reflection. This rune means "Lake,"\nand those branded by it enjoy augmented defense.\n\nGreat volumes of water serve as a bulwark guarding sleep,\nand an augur of the eldritch Truth.\n\nOvercome this hindrance, and seek what is yours.

11000021	A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth. \n\nA transcription of the roar of a labyrinth beast, the bearer of the "Beast" rune has accentuated transformation effects. \n\n"Beast" is one of the early Caryll Runes, as well as one of the first to be deemed forbidden. The discovery of blood entailed the discovery of undesirable beasts.

11000023	
11000024	
11000025	A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.\n\nSeveral runes relate to "blood," including "Communion,"\nwhich raises the maximum number of blood vials\none may carry. \n\nThis rune represents the Healing Church and its \nministers. Blood ministration is, of course, the pursuit \nof communion.
11000026	A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth. \n\nThe Great One Oedon, lacking form, exists only in voice, and is symbolized by this rune. Those branded by it enjoy a larger supply of Quicksilver Bullets.\n\nHuman or no, the oozing blood is a medium of the highest grade, and the essence of the formless Great One, Oedon.\nBoth Oedon, and Oedon's inadvertent worshippers, surreptitiously seek the precious blood.
11010002	A blood gem that fortifies weapons and adds various\nproperties. \n\nMost radial blood gems have effects that bear\nupon physical attacks, and this golden radial blood gem,\nkept for generations within the Church, strengthens\nattacks against those afflicted intensely by beasthood.\n\nWhen clerics began transforming into unspeakable\nbeasts, the Church needed something to retaliate with.
12000004	A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.\n\nThe rune for "Radiance," adopted by the sworn\nexecutioners under Logarius' command.\n\nThe executioners despise the impure Vilebloods,\nand no matter what the circumstances, would\nnever cooperate with the bloodthirsty hunters\nwho serve the undead queen, Annalise.
12000005	A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.\n\nSeveral runes contain a nuance of "Blood," including the rune of "Corruption," associated with the oath of the corrupt. \n\nPledgers to this oath are Cainhurst Vilebloods, hunters of blood who find dregs for their Queen in coldblood, particularly in that of hunters.\nYet the corrupt are heretics in the eyes of the Church, and thus subject to the wrath of the Executioners.
12000006	A secret symbol left by Caryll, runesmith of Byrgenwerth.\n\nThis red-smudged rune means "Hunter,"\nand was adopted by the hunter of hunters oath.\n\nThese watchmen admonish those who have become\nintoxicated with blood. Be they men or beasts,\nanyone who has antagonized the pledgers\nof the "Hunter" oath surely has an issue with blood.
16010000	A blood gem that fortifies weapons and adds various\nproperties. \n\nDroplet blood gems are special gems that\nadapt to various weapons and shapes.\n\nCreated from a bright-red brooch, this blood gem\nstrengthens the effect of rallying. A quintessential\nhunter skill, rallying symbolizes the battle-worn hunter\nwho is often the only thing standing after a bloodbath.
16010001	A blood gem that fortifies weapons and adds various properties. \n\nDroplet blood gems are special gems that adapt to various weapons and shapes.\n\nCreated from a shining silver doll tear, this blood gem is a quiet but unfaltering friend that continually restores HP, the life essence of a hunter. Perhaps the doll's creator had wished for just such a friend, albeit in vain.
